title: Chef's Menu
description: A marketplace platform for matching area chefs with users in search of a unique culinary experience: watching a gourmet meal be prepared in your own kitchen! It works like this. Chef users join the platform and provide information like where they are located, how far they are willing to travel, and what meals they can prepare. Customer users log on to the platform to search for chefs by location and cuisine, inspect their menus, and make in-home cooking appointments.

title: Nanowrimo Text Editor
description: An web-based document editor that tracks word-count progress and rewards milestones with images for inspiration.

title: FB Messenger Time Zone Extension
description: A Chrome extension that allows the user to assign a time zone to the friends they message with. Once the friend is assigned a time zone, UI elements that display time will be updated to show both user and friend's times.
